original_text: And every soul that eateth that which died of itself, or that which was torn with beasts, whether it be one of your own country, or a stranger, he shall both wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even: then shall he be clean.
korean_text: 또 스스로 죽은 것이나 들짐승에게 찢겨 죽은 것을 먹은 모든 자는 본토인이거나 거류민이거나 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하고 그 후에는 정하려니와

sentences.original_text: And every soul that eateth that which died of itself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 스스로 죽은 것을 먹는 모든 영혼은

sentences.original_text: or that which was torn with beasts
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 짐승에게 찢겨진 것을 먹는 모든 영혼은

sentences.original_text: whether it be one of your own country
he shall both wash his clothes
and be unclean until the even
